root.name: Bass Pro Shops Trophy Hunter 2007
root.description: Stalk 14 animals in this hunting game.10 different areas, including the desert to the Rocky Mountains to snow covered Northwest territories.Use ATV's or Snowmobiles to assist in finding those perfect hunting spots.Get the perfect kill using hides, calls, scents, and tree stands to assist your hunting game.Scalable balistics system features real-time dynamics that are affected by foliage, wind, movement, and bullet-type.There are 2 modes of gameplay in this version.Quick Hunt - which throws players right into the hunt.\Career Hunt - Throws various objectives and scenarios in a players path, turning him or her into the ultimate game hunter.
